entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PrincipalContext.ValidateCredentials against the local SAM store fails with a PrincipalOperationException after any successful call to ValidateCredentials against the local SAM store #106905
  • Codify that String.Create can write over the string's null terminator #106903
    Future
  • Broken Trusted Authentication when "X.509 Basic Policy" is set to "Always Trust" after migrating from xamarin to .net 8 #106902
  • Assertion Failure: ``assert (n < gc_heap::n_heaps)`` #106898
  • FreeBSD tests crash with HRESULT: 0x8007FF02 from #106724 #106892
  • Timeout in runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource.cmd #106890
  • Upgrade native brotli to version 1.0.10 #106887
  • [release/8.0] Upgrade CI from producing CentOS Stream 8 artifacts to CentOS Stream 9 #106883
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!arg->OperIsPutArg()' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #106876
    9.0.0
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed 'intrin.op3->IsVectorZero()' during 'Generate code' #106872
  • JIT SVE: Bad codegen with `TestFirstTrue` #106871
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed 'nestedOp2->OperIsHWIntrinsic()' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #106869
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed '!"Got unexpected instruction format after MOVPRFX"' during 'Emit code' #106868
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed 'secondId->idReg1() != secondId->idReg4()' during 'Emit code' #106867
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed '(targetReg == op1Reg) || (targetReg != op3Reg)' during 'Generate code' #106866
  • XmlSerializerTests.Xml_DerivedIXmlSerializable is failing on linux-musl legs #106865
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed 'targetReg != embMaskOp2Reg' during 'Generate code' #106864
  • [API Proposal]: x86 PREFETCHW Intrinsics #106863
  • Validation by `IStartupValidator` should be performed before initializing `IHostedService` #106862
  • System.Net.Http.DiagnosticsHandler.InjectHeaders does not add baggage to the existing header in the request header #106861
  • [API Proposal]: Arm Prefetch Intrinsics #106860
  • SSLStream write delay on Android #106885
    Future
  • Last versions of preview like 1-7 don't work with Microsoft ML Benchmarks. #106856
  • Argument type mismatch error while running asp.net benchmark with net6.0. #106855
  • Test failed: new unknown error in reliability framework test #106853
  • Test failed: reliability framework test hang #106852
  • Test failure: System.ComponentModel.EventBasedAsync.Tests.BackgroundWorkerTests.TestCancelAsync #106849
  • Test failure: Interop/IJW/CopyConstructorMarshaler/CopyConstructorMarshaler/CopyConstructorMarshaler.cmd #106848
  • Assertion Failure: assert (heap_segment_committed (region) == heap_segment_mem (region)); #106847
    10.0.0
  • wasi project with long path results in error clang linking on Windows #106845
    10.0.0

Closed

  • ILLink analyzer produces dataflow warnings even for invalid annotations #101211
    10.0.0
  • [Mono JIT] common_call_trampoline SIGSEGV when invoking native function pointer #106811
  • Performance issue with ASP .NET 6.0 integration tests executed on .NET 7.0-preview #74756
    Future
  • Double.NegativeZero constant has an incorrect bit format #106857
  • [API Proposal]: Math.Min<T> / Math.Max<T> / Math.Clamp<T> #106870
  • superpmi-diffs pipeline fails on clean replay #106851
    10.0.0
  • Add a managed API to enumerate and mutate the heap #12628
  • Error: Garbage collector could not allocate #103719
    10.0.0
  • failure in BidirectionStreamingTest.BackwardsCompatibility_DowngradeToHttp11 #106086
    8.0.x
  • at GC_Regressions._v2_0_beta2_452950_452950_452950_._v2_0_beta2_452950_452950_452950_cmd() #100174
    Future
  • Implement IsNullOrWhitespace using SearchValues #106235
  • Serializing Dictionary with nulls with JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingNull emits null values. #106617
  • CMS Unable to Add Data to UnsignedAttributes Post-Signing in .NET Framework 4.8 #106808
  • Test failure: GC\\Features\\HeapExpansion\\Finalizer\\Finalizer.cmd #102706
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix object.GetType dataflow edge case #106909
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: emit vzeroupper before calls to the bulk write barrier helper #106908
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use OpenSSL 3's HKDF if it is available #106906
    area-System.Security
  • Fix storage of stack trace of exception from reflection #106901
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add a SearchValues implementation for values with unique low nibbles #106900
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [mono][mini] Interlocked.CompareExchange and Interlocked.Exchange intrinsics for small types and enums #106897
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • [PERF] Remove python venv module installation from setup script #106896
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix IL2104 link #106895
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/9.0] Test fix: Disable IOCP config var test #106894
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update Azure Linux tag names #106884
    needs-area-label
  • Revert "[LoongArch64] Add proj to generate nupkg runtime.linux-loongarch64.runtime.native.System.IO.Ports" #106882
    area-System.IO, arch-loongarch64
  • [release/9.0] Emscripten version reference for RTM build #106881
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Disable event source in mobile sample apps #106880
    test-enhancement, os-android, area-VM-meta-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Do not allow a non-keyed service to be injected to a keyed parameter #106877
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.x
  • BinaryFormatter tests should be skipped only on AOT, WASM and Mobile #106858
    area-System.Runtime, test-enhancement, binaryformatter-migration
  • Stop counting work items from ThreadPoolTypedWorkItemQueue for ThreadPool.CompletedWorkItemCount #106854
    area-System.Threading
  • Split identifier calculation from code context and bind marshallers to the code context #106846
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator

Merged

  • Fix dataflow warnings for invalid trim annotations #106672
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/9.0] Use OpenSSL 3's KBKDF for SP800-108 if it is available #106893
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 9.0.0
  • Use RoundtripKind in new IXmlSerializable tests #106891
    area-Serialization, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix invalid handle bug happening when `TypeBuilder` type used in exception catch clause #106704
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [release/9.0] Make SafeEvpPKeyHandle.OpenKeyFromProvider throw PNSE on OSSL less than 3.0 #106753
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • Bump versioning to .NET 10 #106421
    area-Infrastructure, 10.0.0
  • More Test System documentation #106899
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono][mini] Interlocked.CompareExchange and Interlocked.Exchange intrinsics for small types and enums #106660
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Add proj to generate nupkg runtime.linux-loongarch64.runtime.native.System.IO.Ports #106850
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [release/9.0] Ensure that constant folding of bitwise operations for float/double are bitwise #106830
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable IOCP config var test #106888
    area-System.Threading, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix stack overflow in the configuration source gen #106668
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [Tar] Fill in the file size even if the file is empty. #106409
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [mono] inflate function pointer types; hang indirect call wrappers on the <Module> #106837
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use OpenSSL 3's KBKDF for SP800-108 if it is available #106779
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 10.0.0
  • Move locks only needed for `AppDomain` off of `BaseDomain` #106833
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Switch 8.0 build images to Azure Linux 3.0 #106170
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/9.0] Fix trimming for DiagnosticSource #106842
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • SPMI: Fix clean asmdiffs #106859
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Move VN-based intrinsic expansion later #106750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove package references from library tests #106737
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reduce committed bytes if mark array commit fails #106400
    area-GC-coreclr

Updated

  • Remove unused custom marshaler code and move ICustomMarshaler and Color marshalling handling to managed code #106735
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Update System.Net.* unit tests to react to SYSLIB0057 obsoletion #104487
    area-System.Net, test-enhancement
  • SuperPMI: ASPNET Collection job #106844
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use FeatureSwitchDefinition in a few places #106564
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • NativeAOT the XUnitLogChecker #103795
    area-Infrastructure
  • Convert tests under GC subtree to the merged test model #92543
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Don't copy XUnit runner to output for local builds #106721
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Ensure that Arm64 correctly handles multiplication of simd by a 64-bit scalar #106839
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable CommittedUsage event for segments #106831
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added additional tests for generic attributes. #106745
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Add tests for assigning dataflow values to generic parameters through MakeGenericType #106832
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Remove JitGenericHandleCache #106843
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Make GetPropertyCount public and fix its return value #106576
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/9.0] Ensure that integer parsing correctly handles non-zero fractional data #106700
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Preserve range check for HW intrinsics with non-const/out-of-range immediates #106765
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove jit helpers for writing IBC log data #106791
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Check HFA alignment for valuetype fields #106099
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Upgrade zlib-ng to 2.2.1 #105771
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Enable all AVX-512 ISA's in Crossgen2 and ILC When Supported #106792
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [cdac] Basic ISOSDacInterface::GetMethodDescData #106413
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2522700 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Fix STLUR for 0 imm #106760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Return null instead of throwing in ServiceDescriptor.ImplementationInstance\Type\Factory if a keyed service #106841
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.x
  • Add Azure 3.0 helix test #106330
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update RedHat 7 -> 8 -- release/6.0-staging #105063
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Clean emsdk setup #106403
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • add support for parallel Connect #106374
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Put all CSEs into SSA #106637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [WIP][mono] Try enable fullAOT-llvm arm64 CI jobs #106615
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #106696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Improve Guid v7 performance on Unix #106525
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Remove HttpClientHandler workarounds #2666

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] disable SocketsHttpHandler support for WASI #2667

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] add support for building WASI and browser debug & release on Linux #2605
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • Integrate TypeSpec into TypeDecls and ABI parsing. #2650

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support tests sharding natively #42986
  • Support one more targets file which will be evaluated immediately after project file but before targets files from NuGet packages. #42970
  • error MSB3030: (NETCORE_ENGINEERING_TELEMETRY=Build) Could not copy the file #42964
  • error MSB3231: Unable to remove directory #42963

Closed

  • Extend the `dotnet run` command discovery protocol to be settable by a Target instead of just Evaluation #42155
    9.0.1xx
  • [NETSDKE2E]Libicu package dependency issue on Ubuntu24.04 #40506
  • DisableTransitiveProjectReferences does not appear to work #42947

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Extend `dotnet run` to invoke a run-command-producing Target #42987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Put binlog directly into the VMR's #42984
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add net10.0 known framework references #42969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable --source for global/path tool install #42965
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Tool install cleanup #42962
    untriaged, Area-Tools

Merged

  • Extend `dotnet run` to invoke a run-command-producing Target #42240
    Document for new feature
  • Stop using IReadOnlyList when it's always single #42866
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Disable fingerprinting in the VanillaWasm test #42918
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • make the workload resolver only light up for the specific entrypoint SDKs we control #41268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Permit workload restore to work with new global.json #42606
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools
  • Remove longstanding comment from C# console template #42497
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Commands for generating shell completion scripts + statically-generated bash script #42416
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • Enable Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #41936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Partner request
  • Revert disabling the toolset package in Helix #42860
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up some code #42775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workload set garbage collection #42475
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-preview.7.24407.1 August 2024 Updates #42699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection Expressions Next (C#13 and beyond) #7913
  • [Proposal]: Compound assignment in object initializer and `with` expression #5176
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CSC : error CS8034: Unable to load Analyzer assembly #74887
  • Collection expressions may result in unnecessary tail increment #74875
  • Microsoft.Cci.PdbWriter.GetAssemblyReferenceAlias throws Null Reference exception #74872

Closed

  • Checked-in `WindowsProxy.winmd` binary in the repository #66718
    17.6
  • Error reporting stops working #74873
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35223.06 #74874

PullRequests

Created

  • Move feature to only working when in 'Preview' #74886
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Switch to storing batched operations on AnalyzerReferences as just paths. #74885
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Switch to an async batching work queue in teh file change listener #74884
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Move build and test to an newer Ubuntu image with longer support #74881
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove last custom ref test assemblies #74880
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove incorrect cast #74876
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • 16 11 net6 #74870
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Pass along services object to make multiple service retrieval easier #74882
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.8 #74883
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Semantic snippets: don't provide snippets when dotting of a type name #74841
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Extract local functions to make project updating simpler to understand. #74878
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Switch to just using paths as keys for file watching #74877
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #74879
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Standardize on NET pre-proc symbol #74859
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #74871
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #74869
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Expose disposing capability on IAssemblyLoaderInternal #74845
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process #74780
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update dartlab pipeline #74811
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Optimize single spread collection expression for `List<T>` #74769
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Field-backed properties: update uses of IsAutoProperty #74798
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make host outputs public #74750
    Area-Compilers, Needs API Review
  • Add option for LSP based auto-insert #74485
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use InterceptorsNamespaces feature name instead of InterceptorsPreviewNamespaces #74865
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix handling default copilot option values #74866
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Async rename commit #74794
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Fix copilot options default value handling #74867
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Http/1.0 keep-alive follow up work #57494
  • Perf improvement: updates #57491
  • Version 17.11.0 - MSAL Exception Unhandled - Blazor WASM #57489
  • Misleading error when DI fails #57488
  • Records, positional parameters, data annotations, model validation and OpenAPI inconsistency #57486
  • Performance degradation for a loop while running in docker container #57485
  • Blazor script inclusion generates W3C Validation Error: "autostart Attribute Not Allowed on element script" #57484
    Backlog
  • ObjectResult - missing discriminator from System.Text.Json polymorphism #57482
  • Blazor Server App - Problem with accessing request scope in DelegatingHandler #57481
  • Potential memory leak in the MultipartReader class #57478
  • The latest 11.x JDK does not appear to be used on helix #57476

Closed

  • Connection Close Behavior on HTTP1.0 Requests #56223
    9.0-preview7
  • Quarantine RST_STREAM_IncompleteRequest_AdditionalWindowUpdateFrame_ConnectionAborted #53744
    Test failures
  • System.InvalidOperationException: NativeOverlapped cannot be reused for multiple operations after .NET 6 to .NET 8 upgrade #54251
  • System.ArgumentException: 'overlapped' was not allocated by this ThreadPoolBoundHandle instance. #46439
  • [Blazor] MSB4018 - "ApplyCompressionNegotiation". - .Net 9.0.100-preview.7.24407.12 #57487
  • Perf improvement: https #57467
  • Perf regression: fortunes, plaintext #57480
  • SignalR connection issue in IIS #57437
  • Cookie auth (with identity) for MAUI Blazor (BlazorWebView) - iOS and Android? #57456
  • Unable to achieve eventcallback from reusable razor component in blazor webassembly #57457
  • Blazor - Offer a way to force browsers to reload bundle.scp.css files #57472
  • Quarantine ServerReset_BeforeRequestBody_ClientBodyThrows #46717
    Test failures

PullRequests

Created

  • Validate local development scenarios in CI #57492
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix race in RST_STREAM_IncompleteRequest_AdditionalWindowUpdateFrame_ConnectionAborted #57450
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Upgrade xunit version to 2.9.0 #57303
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix StreamPool_MultipleStreamsConcurrent_StreamsReturnedToPool #57473
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Unquarantine ServerReset_BeforeRequestBody_ClientBodyThrows #57470
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • feat: DefaultOutputCachePolicyProvider added #57362
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, area-middleware
  • Middleware/Rewrite: Update XML comments for "AddRedirect" to indicate status code. #57224
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, area-middleware
  • Removing unsafe code in BufferExtensions #57417
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • ApiExplorer Support for HttpResults types for Controllers #57464
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Unquarantine Frame_MultipleStreams_RequestsNotFinished_DefaultMaxStreamsPerConnection_EnhanceYourCalmAfterDoubleMaxStreams #57471
    area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-23
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Sync shared (PAL, utilcode, inc, etc.) files with latest runtime #4885

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Changed order of calls to properly close MediaPicker Activity / ViewController and set the picker result #24412
    .NET 8 SR9
  • ContentPage unload event fires, if another page is opened, not if at unload #24410
  • .Net 8 MAUI Memory Leaks after navigating to multiple pages and then navigating to root page. #24409
  • [net9.0] Blazor MAUI App hangs during back navigation because of disconnect code #24407
    9.0-rc2
  • Clean up the concepts of WrapperView #24406
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Windows: Entry with right aligned text keeps text jumping to the left during editing #24405
    Backlog
  • [MacCatalyst] Failure to run in release mode (arm64) #24404
  • Non-fatal Exception: System.ArgumentNullException #24402
  • App does not want to publish to ios not even simulator #24400
  • [Bug] [platform/android] [area-essentials] Shared Preference Android #24397

Closed

  • FlyoutItemIsVisible is not working with bindings #24203
    9.0-rc1
  • [Testing] Resolve FlyoutHeaderAdaptsToMinimumHeight Failures #24284
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Making previously hidden Border visible has a "jelly effect" on iOS #24311
  • Vertical CarouselView with PeekAreaInsets crashes on iOS #24166
  • Border control display bug in a Grid (Windows) #14573
  • SelectionLength Property Not Applied to Entry at Runtime #18443
    Backlog
  • Unable to debug Android MAUI App in Visual Studio for Mac #24395
  • Image size is not stable on MacOS and iOS #9899
  • The image is not rendered on iOS only the first time #9902
  • [Android][MAUI-8.0.7] CPU usage consistently remains above 10%, even without any operation #20684
    Backlog
  • Changing the MainPage resets the ModalStack of Navigation without popping the pages #24090
  • AOT+Trimming crashes app on some Android devices #24088

PullRequests

Created

  • [Testing] CollectionViewInfiniteScroll Conversion to UI Test #24411
    area-testing
  • Use older JS API for HybridWebView test code and wait longer for web view to be ready #24408
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Move to internal net9 rc1 #24399
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨
  • Update FlyoutViewHandler.Android.cs #24394
    community ✨

Merged

  • Merge main into net9.0 #24398
  • Fixed FlyoutItemIsVisible is not working with bindings #24212
    community ✨
  • [Testing] moved FlyoutHeaderAdaptsToMinimumHeight to appium #24294
    community ✨, testing-green-ci
  • [Android] Fix for Entry SelectionLength #24064
    community ✨
  • Merge main into net9.0 #24385

Updated

  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
  • [net9.0] Fix API23 Core device tests #24128
    testing-green-ci
  • Fix "Grey" cannot be used to set Background property #24325
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix Entry clear button is not taking the color of the text. #24196
    community ✨
  • Add Device logs to Integration Tests #24268
    9.0-rc1
  • [net9.0] Fix loop CarouselViewHandler2 #24230
    9.0-rc1
  • Fixed the CollectionView GroupFooterTemplate crashes the application #24205
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨
  • [Windows] Bump `Microsoft.Web.WebView2` from `1.0.2592.51` to `1.0.2651.64` #24329
    community ✨
  • 894511 : Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24161
    community ✨
  • UI testing doc changes #24165
    area-docs
  • Add Styleable Element to simplify styling for external libraries #24387
  • Optimize ordering of children in Flex layout #21961
    area-layout, community ✨, layout-flex, t/perf
  • Add support for `TextAlignment.Justify` - fix #24376
    community ✨
  • Add a hard liimit on the size of an Image which can be loaded #24305
  • Move some absolute layout api docs directly in code #24332
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Migrate xml docs directly into code for ExtensionPoints #24333
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Revert "[ios] fix memory leak in CollectionView cells (#15831)" #24310
    community ✨
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8 #24206
  • [Windows] Handle focus events using `FocusManager` #24355
    community ✨
  • Obsolete Compatibility.Layout #24342
  • [iOS] SwipeView: Fix reenabling parent scrolling after cancelled swipe #23442
    community ✨
  • Make the screenshot comparison more strict #24335
  • 899474: Entry/Editor completed event is not triggered properly when unfocused #24207
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Upgrade Windows App SDK from 1.5.5 to 1.5.6 #24328
    community ✨
  • Fix for FlexLayout padding issue #24195
    community ✨
  • Fix border lagging and unwanted animations on iOS #24360
    community ✨
  • [X] CSS specificity #19335
    area-xaml, stale
  • [iOS] Readonly Editor - Scrolling fix #20505
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [X] deprecate fontImageExtension #23657
    area-fonts
  • [XC] Fallback to reflection-based bindings for bindings with "invalid" path #24238
  • Fixed the label text from being cut off from the top when the specified LineHeight. #24273
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for the CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled #24160
    community ✨
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix memory leak with GroupedItemTemplateCollection #23386
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Unable to cast object of type 'System.String' to type 'System.Int32'" #34521
  • Incorrect projected ColumnExpression when using SqlQuery #34518
    10.0.0
  • Task Discriminator_values_are_not_marked_as_unknown cannot be overwritten. #34517

Closed

  • Unneeded columns in the projection of a JOIN subquery #34516
  • EF Core memory leak #34409

PullRequests

Created

  • Make Discriminator_values_are_not_marked_as_unknown virtual (#34517) #34520
  • Fix CLR type of SqlQuery projected column #34519

Updated

  • Acquire the migrations database lock in a transaction. #34489
    providers-beware, tell-mode
  • Added Support for translating Array.IndexOf methods for byte arrays for SqlServer & SQLite #34457
